text: Miguel Alfredo González Puebla (September 23, 1983 – November 23, 2017) was a Cuban professional baseball pitcher. He played in the Cuban National Series, for the Cuban national baseball team, and for the Philadelphia Phillies of Major League Baseball (MLB) during the 2014 season. He was born in Havana, Cuba. González was killed in a car accident in Havana, Cuba, on November 23, 2017 at the age of 34. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1983 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Sportspeople from Havana
title: Miguel Alfredo González
